summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3152 for the improvement of West Garfield Street, from Fifteenth Avenue West to a point one thousand two hundred sixty-five (1,265) feet west of the west margin of Fifteenth Avenue West all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38482, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
